New Records: F. Alvarez became the youngest Mets player to hit 11 home runs in a season at 20 years old.
L. Acuña hit his 3rd home run of the season, tying a career-high with 3 in a single game.
S. Manaea tied a career-high with 12 wins, becoming the first Mets pitcher to win 12 games since 2016.
E. Diaz recorded his 19th save, tying a career-high with 19 saves in a single season.
Key Match Events: F. Alvarez and L. Acuña became the first Mets teammates to hit home runs in the same inning since 2018.
J. Iglesias scored his 16th career RBI in the 8th inning, tying a career-high with 16 RBI in a single game.
The Mets bullpen combined for 3.2 innings of scoreless relief, including 1.1 innings from E. Diaz to close the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played under clear skies with temperatures around 78 degrees at first pitch.
This was the 100th meeting between the Mets and Phillies in regular-season history.
Others: The game started at 8:10 PM and ended at 2:23 AM, lasting 6 innings and 23 minutes.
The attendance was 44,152 fans at Citi Field.
